params._amounts: The list of corresponding number of token to deposit.
params._gasLimit: Estimated gas limit required to complete the deposit on layer 2.
params._to: The address of recipient on layer 2.
params._token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 1.
params._tokenIds: The list of token ids to deposit.

params._amounts: The list of corresponding number of token to deposit.
params._gasLimit: Estimated gas limit required to complete the deposit on layer 2.
params._token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 1.
params._tokenIds: The list of token ids to deposit.

params._counterpart: The address of `L1ERC1155Gateway` contract in L2.
params._messenger: The address of `L1ScrollMessenger` contract in L1.

params._amount: The amount of token to deposit.
params._gasLimit: Estimated gas limit required to complete the deposit on layer 2.
params._to: The address of recipient on layer 2.
params._token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 1.

params._amount: The amount of token to deposit.
params._gasLimit: Estimated gas limit required to complete the deposit on layer 2.
params._token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 1.

params._amounts: The list of corresponding number of token to withdraw.
params._from: The address of account who withdraw the token on layer 2.
params._l1Token: The address of corresponding layer 1 token.
params._l2Token: The address of corresponding layer 2 token.
params._to: The address of recipient on layer 1 to receive the token.
params._tokenIds: The list of token ids to withdraw.

params._amount: The amount of token to withdraw.
params._from: The address of account who withdraw the token on layer 2.
params._l1Token: The address of corresponding layer 1 token.
params._l2Token: The address of corresponding layer 2 token.
params._to: The address of recipient on layer 1 to receive the token.

params._counterpart: The address of L2ERC1155Gateway in L2.
params._messenger: The address of L1ScrollMessenger in L1.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._l1Token: The address of ERC1155 token on layer 1.
params._l2Token: The address of corresponding ERC1155 token on layer 2.

batchDepositERC1155(address,address,uint.notice: Deposit a list of some ERC1155 NFT to a recipient's account on layer 2.

batchDepositERC1155(address,uint256[],ui.notice: Deposit a list of some ERC1155 NFT to caller's account on layer 2.

counterpart().notice: The address of corresponding L1/L2 Gateway contract.

depositERC1155(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Deposit some ERC1155 NFT to a recipient's account on layer 2.

depositERC1155(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Deposit some ERC1155 NFT to caller's account on layer 2.

finalizeBatchWithdrawERC1155(address,add.notice: Complete ERC1155 batch withdraw from layer 2 to layer 1 and send fund to recipient's account on layer 1.      The function should only be called by L1ScrollMessenger.      The function should also only be called by L2ERC1155Gateway on layer 2.

finalizeWithdrawERC1155(address,address,.notice: Complete ERC1155 withdraw from layer 2 to layer 1 and send fund to recipient's account on layer 1.      The function should only be called by L1ScrollMessenger.      The function should also only be called by L2ERC1155Gateway on layer 2.

messenger().notice: The address of corresponding L1ScrollMessenger/L2ScrollMessenger contract.

tokenMapping(address).notice: Mapping from l1 token address to l2 token address for ERC1155 NFT.

updateTokenMapping(address,address).notice: Update layer 2 to layer 2 token mapping.

documentation.text: @notice Mapping from l1 token address to l2 token address for ERC1155 NFT.

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(address payable,address payable,address payable,address payable,uint256[] memory,uint256[] memory)
